content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5) to transfer materials to/from the furnace.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) for extracting iron ore.
- Two Burner Inserters at positions (-16.5, -51.5) and (-14.5, -51.5) to manage the flow of iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) for storing extracted iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is no obstruction at the intended placement location before attempting to place an entity. This will prevent errors such as "Cannot place burner-inserter at the target location - something is in the way."

### Insufficient Iron Ore Collection
- Regularly check and adjust connections to ensure a steady supply of iron ore to the furnace. This will prevent the furnace from running out of ingredients to smelt.

### Output Blockage
- Ensure there is a sink entity available to accept outputs from inserters to avoid output blockage errors.
